clauses.title: Scope of Services
clauses.body: This MSA governs all projects between {{company_a}} and {{company_b}}.

clauses.title: Statements of Work
clauses.body: Each project will be defined in a separate Statement of Work signed by both parties.

clauses.title: Fees & Payments
clauses.body: Invoices follow {{payment_terms}} unless otherwise stated in the SOW.

clauses.title: Intellectual Property
clauses.body: Ownership and licenses are defined per SOW.

clauses.title: Liability Cap
clauses.body: Aggregate liability shall not exceed total fees paid under the applicable SOW.
